name: Hermès Silk Scarf 90cm
description: Iconic silk twill scarf featuring equestrian motifs. Hand-rolled edges and vibrant colors make this a timeless accessory.
care_instructions: Dry clean only. Store flat or rolled. Avoid direct sunlight.
story: Hermès scarves have been a symbol of luxury and craftsmanship since 1937.
meta_description: Classic Hermès silk scarf with equestrian design and hand-rolled edges

name: Cartier Santos Sunglasses
description: Sophisticated aviator sunglasses with golden finish and signature screws. Features UV protection and premium lenses.
care_instructions: Clean with microfiber cloth. Store in protective case when not in use.
story: Inspired by the Santos watch collection, these sunglasses embody Cartier's design excellence.
meta_description: Premium Cartier aviator sunglasses with golden finish and signature design

name: Bottega Veneta Intrecciato Belt
description: Signature intrecciato woven leather belt with polished buckle. Crafted from premium Italian leather.
care_instructions: Condition leather regularly. Store hanging or flat.
story: The intrecciato weave is Bottega Veneta's signature technique, representing Italian craftsmanship.
meta_title: Bottega Veneta Intrecciato Belt - Luxury Leather Accessory
meta_description: Signature woven leather belt with iconic intrecciato pattern and polished buckle

name: Chanel Camellia Brooch
description: Elegant camellia flower brooch in white gold with pearl center. A timeless piece from Chanel's jewelry collection.
care_instructions: Professional cleaning recommended. Store in jewelry box.
story: The camellia flower has been Gabrielle Chanel's favorite since 1913.
meta_title: Chanel Camellia Brooch - Luxury Jewelry Accessory
meta_description: Exquisite Chanel camellia brooch in white gold with pearl center

name: Prada Saffiano Leather Keychain
description: Minimalist keychain in signature Saffiano leather with metal logo plaque. Perfect luxury accent piece.
care_instructions: Wipe clean with damp cloth. Avoid excessive moisture.
story: Saffiano leather was first used by Prada in 1913 and remains a house signature.
meta_title: Prada Saffiano Keychain - Luxury Leather Accessory
meta_description: Elegant Prada keychain in signature Saffiano leather with metal logo
